title: ARURF
body: Is ARURF going to be available to be played in a custom game next patch

replies.body: I can see why some people would like it, but the idea of having no penalty for leaving those games means that people will just leave if they get a bad champ and games will take forever to form because of it.

> [{quoted}](name=CringeWorthyness,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A1ljyHEN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-03T00:13:35.865+0000)
>
> I can see why some people would like it, but the idea of having no penalty for leaving those games means that people will just leave if they get a bad champ and games will take forever to form because of it.

Totally not me 
*cough
